I'm

programmer, developer, an adventurer

I was born in an adventist faith. I was taught how to pray, read bible and lessons, sing hymns during morning and evening worships.

As early as seven years of age, I become acquainted in church activities and services, and that how I was raised by my parents.

Looking at my physical appearance, you can describe me as a thinned-body with a messy hair style and a face covered with long, unshaved mustache and beard. Standing with a 5'3 inches tall in terms of height. I have few siblings, and we are just eight in number. Raised by my hardworking tricycle driver father and a housewife mother.

Skills

Computer Repair Service

Reformat and installation of operating system and necessary applications.

Technical Support

Monitor and maintain an organisation's computer systems and networks. Diagnose any hardware or software faults with these systems and will solve the issues either in person or over the phone.

Networking

Programming Language

CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. CSS describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media. CSS saves a lot of work. It can control the layout of multiple web pages all at once.


HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is a text-based approach to describing how content contained within an HTML file is structured. This markup tells a web browser how to display text, images and other forms of multimedia on a webpage.


Javascript (JS) is a scripting languages, primarily used on the Web. It is used to enhance HTML pages and is commonly found embedded in HTML code.


PHP (recursive acronym for PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor) is a widely-used open source general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.
